attributes.description: You know that moment when you’re sitting in a nice restaurant, enjoying an intimate meal with your beau, when suddenly the server—who's been falling all over himself around you all evening—accidently spills the glass of red wine you’ve been savoring, effectively ruining your outfit? And rather than throttle him, you just smile gracefully and tell him it’s quite alright. “But wait,” you ask, “how do you expect me to miraculously attain such saintly graciousness as to dismiss the ruination of such beloved attire?” The answer is simple; you’ll be thinking that the loss of one outfit gives you the perfect excuse to seek its replacement. A cozy new cardigan for instance (hint; like this one). So, as the wine stain becomes permanent, this one happy thought will no doubt make you feel so indebted to the server that you’ll be hard-pressed not to leave a good tip despite. Model is wearing a small. • 55% Cotton 30% Acrylic 15% Nylon • Hand Wash Cold • Unlined • Imported
attributes.title: Quite Alright Marsala Red Cardigan

In other words, she knows when to let her wardrobe do all the talking for her. This dress says volumes, and we'll leave it up to you, what you want it say and to whom you would like it to speak. attributes.description: Anything that's this Chic is Easy, and anything this Easy can be made Chic. Except that girl in your Chem 101 class, the one that sits in the third row, five seats to left. She's easy and there's absolutely nothing that's even remotely chic about her, and even with a ton of work, time, and loads of TLC, that girl cannot be saved from herself. A deity could help her out, maybe, but barring that, and the aid of this blouse, she's out of luck. But seriously, this top is Chic and Easy, and 99.9% of women can pull it off with nary a pitfall! core.name: With All My Heart Red Dress

attributes.description: Dear Ex-boyfriend, I bought a new dress online the other day. It has precisely the shape that you love on me, even the color. I can see us at our favorite restaurant, in that quiet little booth in the corner, all cuddled up, enjoying our meal and our time together. Unfortunately, you turned into one of ‘those’ guys. The controlling type that likes to tell women what to do and where to go, and I’m just not for that. So to answer your text from last night: No we’re never ever ever getting back together. To cement that answer, enclosed in this envelope you will find a picture of me in the dress, on a date with my new boyfriend. Enjoy. With All My Heart, your loving and now happy Ex-girlfriend. This dress features a sweetheart neckline, zipper and fish hook in the back and visible stitching along bust and bottom. Also features adjustable sash tie around arms, full lining and a structured bodice. Model is wearing a small. • 95% Polyester 5% Spandex • Hand Wash Cold • Unlined • Made in the

The formula’s delicate satin texture fused with highly saturated color delivers full-yet-lightweight coverage with a luxurious satin finish. All shades contain the following unless otherwise noted: Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Octyldodecanol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Oleyl Alcohol, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Candelilla Cera/Cire de Candelilla, Polyethylene, Ozokerite, Hydrogenated Microcrystalline Wax, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate, BHT, Alumina, Flavor/Aroma. MAY CONTAIN / PEUT CONTENIR (+/-): Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 7 (CI 15850), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 36 (CI 12085), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090).

core.name: Relish The Moment Red Embroidered Dress

attributes.description: The thing about moments is that they're fleeting. They're there one moment, gone the next. Most of the time, you don't even realize you missed a moment until it's already over with. Our solution, Relish The Moment by celebrating it in this gorgeous Embroidered Dress. Why is clothing important? Because it's memorable. It adds to the moment and it helps you to slow down and realize how special the moment is before it passes you by. So if anything, we're doing you a huge favor by making you take stock of what really matters. Who knew fashion could do something so meaningful? We did. We totally did. Red sun dress features a flowy, drop waist silhouette with an asymmetrical hemline, keyhole opening in front, exposed zipped in back, and colorful flower embroidery throughout the front and back.
